Super jeu mais beaucoup trop de bugs pour le moment. J'ai l'impression de jouer à un jeu en alpha.
A voir dans quelques années...

Игра топ, особенно чтобы пофанится с друзьями. В игре очень много плюсов но есть и минусы, один из главных минусов для меня то что тут решает донат, но если научится играть за дефолтных манов и сурвов то донат тебе не нуженю. Игра топ, всем советую.

Das Spiel ist relativ simpel aber immer wieder neu, weil die Mitspieler meist andere sind und das Teamplay dadurch immer anders ausfällt. Das ist spannend, oftmals auch frustrierend und als Anfänger kann man schon mal die Lust am Spiel verlieren. Wenn man das einmal überwunden hat und dabei bleibt, wird man süchtig danach. ;)

Me encantaría poder votar positivo este juego, porque realmente es muy entretenido ser tanto asesino como superviviente, pero no puedo. Es el único juego que me congela el PC a los minutos de abrir el juego, o tras haber estado jugando horas al mismo, al cerrarlo, a los minutos se congela el PC entero. Es el único juego que me provoca esto, y no será por PC, porque juegos como Rainbow Six Siege, que pide mucho más PC, no me provoca estos fallos. Y esto no me ha ocurrido hasta que ha llegado el DLC de Némesis.

ARREGLAD EL MALDITO JUEGO. ES UNA VERGÜENZA QUE EN PLENO QUINTO ANIVERSARIO, CON LA LLEGADA DEL DLC DE RESIDENT EVIL, ESTÉ COMPLETAMENTE ROTO.
非常好玩，把我多年的心脏病治好了

When the Meg says "GG EZ LOSER" when you give them hatch...

Just kidding it's actually a fine game, just enjoy it for what it is and don't read into the chat, don't watch the TTV's stream.
Game quality on it's own: 8/10 (bad graphics at times, bugs, but has great gameplay and the perks are fun and the mechanics are interesting)
Game quality including community/toxic players: 5/10 (IGNORE THEM AND IT'S GREAT!)

这个游戏在国内的宣传受限，再加上对萌新不算是很友好，新玩家越来越少，或者是买了没玩多久就弃坑了。
目前算是屠夫单边玩家，刚打到2段，确实现在人类车队修机很快，稍微节奏没控好机子就啪啪啪亮，屠夫对控机技能是刚需，但不可否认这个游戏仍是非常优秀的水准。
只是希望新玩家能给这个游戏一点耐心，慢慢就会探索到乐趣的。

Juegazo
Como todo juego, es para disfrutarlo y pasarlo bien
Ambientación increíble, buenos y variados mapas
Supervivientes con cámara en tercera persona, prestando atención a los ruidos y el entorno
Asesinos en primera persona, atento a las marcas, los cuervos y los sonidos
La posibilidad de jugar con personajes de películas de terror icónicas (siendo uno de los casos el de Michael Myers y el de Laurie Strode) le da un toque especial
Un abanico de habilidades para los survivors, una habilidad especial e igualmente variadas perks para los killers, logran que cada partida sea diferente
Lo mantienen actualizado constantemente, siendo mis inicios por el 2017, sencillamente increíble
10/10.
I sure do have a lot of fun dying
杀韩国狗是我唯一的乐趣
the devs add new content then never balance the game
They have updated the game and the queue times are not that long anymore. Better lighting on maps and graphics
生化危机联动入的坑，屠夫玩的非常嗨，追着人类跑的感觉很爽。一开始玩屠夫是因为需要升技能，屠夫血点打的很快，玩了六十多个小时刷着刷着就打到1段了，匹配机制除了语音车队太bug其他都还凑合。

Due to its age and popularity, I doubt this game needs anymore reviews to assist in drawing in new players, but I'll contribute my genuine two cents regardless because I want the Steam level points.

Dead by Daylight is honestly a really fantastic game in a multitude of ways; it's thrilling, challenging, rewarding and engaging. It is a terrific concept that I believe has been successfully executed.

The ability to learn about and play as/against some incredibly unique original characters is already a thrill, but the licensed characters undoubtedly do wonders for the overall appeal. From Nemesis of [i]Resident Evil[/i] to Leatherface of [i]The Texas Chainsaw Massacre[/i], Steve Harrington and Nancy Wheeler of [i]Stranger Things[/i] to David Tapp of the [i]Saw[/i] franchise, you can have your go at immersing yourself and becoming all of them, some even on their respective maps if you're lucky or have a cheeky map offering.

One thing I also notably love about this game is the fact that escaping the trial alive isn't the be-all-and-end-all, and you're still well-rewarded in the ranking system for things like altruism, completing primary and secondary objectives and engaging in chases with the enemy.

However, moving onto the state of the game itself, it's pretty much packed full of various bugs that either go unnoticed by the majority or make the game borderline unplayable at times. It can be extremely frustrating, so that's something to consider, although the developers seem to be relatively frequent with their patches. Your immersion might also be shattered when you see a Claudette gliding around the map perma-locked in the generator repair animation, but I'd go as far as to say that's a good thing just because of the laughs I get out of it.

To conclude, I would absolutely recommend Dead by Daylight to anyone who is interested in playing it and to anyone who simply likes any of the licensed characters that have been released over time. I definitely hopped on the train late (started playing in May, 2021), but I've already racked up over 260 hours and plan to keep going for a long while.
É uma bomba but eu amo peepoHappy

*unless you're on console.
Great gameplay, kind of bland when you get randoms that don't pull their weight, but with 1-2 friends it can easily be a really enjoyable time.

本来非常热爱这个游戏的，但是糟糕的匹配机制让我不得不给差评，经常13段杀手匹配到全紫红逃生者，什么时候改善后再给好评…
在这条评测后又玩了100小时，我仍然没有改变自己的态度，我就想问浣熊市警察局是开发组的亲爹吗，玩枯萎者除了中间断过一次连续5局警察局，喜欢根据杀手能力恶意匹配劣势图还是怎么做的的？
Auch wenn das Spiel immer mal wieder Bugs aufweist, macht es dennoch unheimlich viel Spaß das Spiel mit Freunden zu spielen
Здорово видеть, как игру всё ещё поддерживают спустя такое время

It's very fun horror game. But it's pretty hard for newcomers since if you don't know how to outplay killers with survivors then you won't have much fun cuz killers are here lotta op. But when you play as killer and get rank 1-10 survivors it's really hard for newcomers too. After you learn the basics and some tricks it's very fun game though.

Great game especially with friends, my experience with the community has also been good.

Dead by Daylight is an amazing game. Great idea. Executed well. However, I do believe players should be more rewarded. Maybe a charm for being rank 1, maybe iridescent shards for rank 1.
a very good game that is fun to play :D

Careful if you buy it, there are many bugs known to the developers that aren't fixable, in my case: 

https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/discussion/263102/unhandled-exception-exception-access-violation-reading-address-0xffffffff/p1?new=1

Unable to refund due to the amount of time trying to fix the game and a few successful rounds (I managed 2 full games with my friends).

游戏很好玩，很喜欢，但是对萌新十分不友好，不论是人类还是屠夫。但是只要度过前期，后面玩起来就很有意思了。欢迎有更多萌新入坑，晚上实在排的太久。
我主玩人类，最讨厌遇到的屠夫是凛妹，希望制作组最好重做一下，有鸣喘的凛妹真的无解，也可能是我太菜了。
最后，祝杀机五周年快乐
